titles.title: To amend chapter 39 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the automobile assistance allowance for certain disabled veterans and members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Increases from $5,500 to $7,500 the automobile assistance allowance provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to eligible disabled veterans and members of the armed forces.
